events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Software Engineer role based on your skills and experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application to guide you through the hiring process and answer any questions you may have.
The initial screening call is scheduled to discuss your background, experience with software development, and motivation for applying.
Thank you for promptly confirming your availability for the initial screening call. We look forward to speaking with you soon.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th. This will focus on software engineering concepts, coding skills, and problem-solving abilities.
The technical interview concluded successfully. You demonstrated strong knowledge in software engineering and solved all coding challenges effectively.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 10th to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and next steps in the hiring process.
